title: Unbanning Tyler1 was a huge mistake..
body:
It just opened the door for players like the one in my last game. He was autofilled support and on a losing streak so he says 
Can i adc
thx
appreciate it

Our adc says no i am adc you are support
Tyler 1 wannabe proceeds to lock in draven and intentionally feed until eventually running it down mid. 

http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=Son0fNone

replies.body:
They did that before he was unbanned as well to 'protest fascism'.

Trash is going to be trash, the excuses are just excuses.
He was unbanned bc riots game is dying and they needed something to bring people back. Tyler 1 even said so himself

> [{quoted}](name=Son0fNone,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=MWduIr0E,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-03-13T04:42:57.582+0000)

> He was unbanned bc riots game is dying and they needed something to bring people back. Tyler 1 even said so himself

And in one of his streams, Tyler1 claimed that he was banned because he was better than Phreak and he was banned for beating Phreak in lane. 

Doesn't mean it's true... He says things to make himself feel better.
Except for the fact that it is true.

> [{quoted}](name=Son0fNone,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=MWduIr0E,comment-id=0000000000010000,timestamp=2018-03-13T07:22:05.701+0000)

If phreak banned players for beating him in lane, there would be a lot more people complaining about it on the forums. He's taking coincidence and interpreting it as causation. Easy thing to mistake for people who don't understand statistics.
The problem is, Riot isn't dying anymore then we as humans are.
And we're suppose to take his words because?

all games are dieing.. im old gamer.. I look for new games to play to get away from this one.. its 2018 and the graphics all seem the same for the past 10 years and nothing insane has appeared or interests me/

where are all the insane games that aren't re-run fps, sports, half Butt budgeted mmorpgs that constantly grab your wallet, rerun rts. (have to say butt instead of .... what a joke).
bunch of money grubbing developers and sponsors who don't care about the experience of the player. so the great game ideas that deserve funding are unable to start up because there is not an instant profit. no time is available to the graphics designers or programmers or game makers since they have to push deadlines and make sure they make money and profit instead of enhancing experience.... SO they are busy developing expansion packs and 20$ skins

this is translated to many subjects throughout the world... a metaphor for the current state of affairs... Though this may not be the fault of the companies or developers at all it is just now the norm and the only way to fund games as people need money to create and live.. and the current economic system can no longer suit creativity and development as priority as it may just not be possible. Or it is and all these games and companies try and branch out and dabble in too many things instead of sticking to their priorities.. making an unbelievable gaming experience and fair competitive scene for the player.
He just got unbanned because he started playing Dota2 and Rito would have lost money if some players chose Dota instead of LoL. $$$ before consistency, this is what Rito does.
